name: Avoid PeopleCode using HAVING (PeopleSoft)
description: This rule searches for all PeopleCode having a HAVING inside the SQL code.
output: This report lists all PeopleSoft Events, Functions and Methods using queries with the HAVING clause.
rationale: Rules of construction of query to improve performances
remediation: Review the design of the query to avoid if possible HAVING clause.
total: Number of PeopleSoft Events, Functions and Methods

technicalCriteria.name: Efficiency - SQL and Data Handling Performance
